page.title: 19A Village Family - Letham.
page.content: There are five in this family. The children are aged 8 years, 6 years and 7 months. Their house is six years old and has 7 rooms. Their household gadgets include a washing machine, tumbler dryer, fridge-freezer, food mixer and vacuum cleaner. Their heating comes from a wood and coal burner. They have a large garden with vegetables and fruit. The husband, who is a Civil Engineer, works an 8 hour day in Glenrothes. In their leisure time both parents and older children enjoy gardening. They regularly go swimming. They read and watch television as time permits. Favourite programmes are snooker. They go to the cinema occasionally. In the holidays, they visit relations and have days out. Their means of transport is an estate car.
